tileset = "suntemple";
area = "sunTemple3";
areaname = "Sun Temple";
dungeon = "SunTemple";
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:29,y:36,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:31,y:8,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"White Gate",model:"object",x:21,y:20,type:"switch_gate",colour:"moonstone"},{name:"White Keystone",model:"object",x:41,y:47,type:"switch_orb",colour:"moonstone",base:"gold"},{name:"DOWN3",model:"area_transition",x:31,y:16,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple4",31,15],ARROW:"S"},{name:"Sun Door",model:"DOOR8",lock:"key",key:"Sun Key",x:31,y:19,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple4",31,21]},{name:"UP",model:"DOOR8",x:6,y:1,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple2",23,6]},{name:"DOWN",model:"DOOR8",x:58,y:1,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple4",58,2]}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.ANTARES)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Idol",model:"object",x:21,y:3,type:"examine",conv:[["angr","It\'s an Idol of SOLAK, God of Suns. These are sculpted by priests and enchanted with levitation magic to show their devotion to their deity, and... is it moving?! Gasp!"],Do = function()
   {
      GameData.plotVars.ANTARES = 1;
      BATTLE([["Antares",null,null,null],["Antares",null,null,null],[15,null,null,null],"SOLO"],"BossBattle",true);
      _root.FLAVOUR.T_21_3 = null;
      return true;
   }]});
}
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ1[1]["Solakian Priest Djhale"])
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Solakian Priest Djhale",model:"solakian",x:16,y:15,walkspeed:-1,dir:"n",elem:"AIR",conv:"c_ch3sq1"});
}
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ1[1]["Solakian Priest Ellavar"])
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Solakian Priest Ellavar",model:"solakian",x:55,y:24,walkspeed:20,dir:"s",elem:"FIRE",conv:"c_ch3sq1"});
}
